title: Anatomy of an Azure IoT Solution
description: Weka Health System's Vaccine Smart Refrigerator is an IoT device designed for health clinics to control the dispensing and storage of vaccines. We'll look under the hood of this real-life Azure IoT solution and discuss the various components and challenges of building such a solution. We'll look at the Azure services in the pipeline, the hardware involved, and how you can leverage Microsoft's IoT Suite to get started.
